{"id":1712357360,"question_id":3404,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1753548017,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1712357360/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Satisfy Conditions","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int ID = 1e7;\n\n    int minimumOperations(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        // pattern: precalculate + dp\n        // dp[i][chosen value] = num ops\n        int N = (int)grid.size(), M = (int)grid[0].size();\n\n        vector<unordered_map<int, int>> cnt(M);\n        for (int i=0; i<M; i++) {\n            cnt[i][ID + i] = 0; // stub id\n            cnt[i][2*ID + i] = 0; // stub id\n            for (int j=0; j<N; j++)\n                cnt[i][grid[j][i]]++; \n        }\n\n        vector<vector<pair<int, int>>> mp(M);\n        for (int i=0; i<M; i++) {\n            for (auto [k, v] : cnt[i]) {\n                mp[i].push_back({v, k});\n            }\n            sort(mp[i].rbegin(), mp[i].rend());\n        }\n\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(M, vector<int>(3, INT_MAX));\n        dp[0][0] = N - mp[0][0].first;\n        dp[0][1] = N - mp[0][1].first;\n        dp[0][2] = N - mp[0][2].first;\n\n        for (int i=1; i<M; i++) {\n            for (int k=0; k<3; k++) { // 0 is the biggest\n                for (int t=0; t<3; t++) {\n                    if (mp[i][k].second != mp[i-1][t].second) {\n                        dp[i][k] = dp[i-1][t] + (N - mp[i][k].first);\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n        for (int i=0; i<3; i++)\n            ans = min(ans, dp[M-1][i]);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-satisfy-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1117}
